name: Break Point
description:
A tennis arcade game for two players.

Starring Microsoft Sam as umpire.

Created in 10 hours for a game jam.

_____________________________

Controller (recommended):

  • Player 1: left stick, left trigger
  • Player 2: right stick, right trigger

Keyboard:

  • Player 1: WASD, left shift
  • Player 2: IJKL, right shift
